#labels Featured
Subversion structure is ready to use.

Here is what to do:

  * Create an empty folder at any place. Preferably name it as "apollovms"
  * Rigth click on the new folder and select "SVN Checkout". Checkout folder should be your newly created folder.
  * In the "URL of repository" field, write: https://apollovms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk
  * It will ask username and password. Write your google account username
  * Generate your password in this address [https://code.google.com/hosting/settings]
  * Dont forget to check Save my username and password setting
  * Press OK and everything will be downloaded from repository.
